title: How 'everything went wrong' for Verstappen and Red Bull in Bahrain
summary: A trying Bahrain GP has left Red Bull and Max Verstappen facing the reality that the titles may be slipping away

qa_pairs.question: What team does Max Verstappen drive for in Formula 1?
What is the significance of the Bahrain Grand Prix in the context of a Formula 1 season?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It can impact the championship standings early in the season.
wrong_options: It is the final race of the season.
It is exclusively a night race.
It has no bearing on title standings.

qa_pairs.question: Which championship titles are typically contested in Formula 1?
wrong_options: Rookie of the Year and Most Improved Driver
